item.title: Fellwanderers roam Peak District
item.author: Claire Roseren,
item.description: 5.30pm on Friday evening. The first fellwanderers made their way to the Union, eager to leave London after a hard week of work. We quickly gathered together, packing out two buses, and excitedly awaited our trip. Leaving London proved rather challenging as cars seemed to be invading the roads, â€¦
